aboutUsParagrah1: We are a group of theatrical fans who have been actively watching the theatrical events of Cyprus for the last decade.
aboutUsParagrah2: But we always had the same problem:
aboutUsParagrah3: Remarkable performances escaped our attention because by the time we realized them they were complete
aboutUsParagrah4: That is why we decided to act. To bring the solution to our problem. The solution we hope will help thousands of other people who may be in the same position.
aboutUsParagrah5: Theatralis was created as the most complete and up-to-date guide to theatrical performances in Cyprus. Made with love by us for you. We hope you enjoy it as much as we do.
